channel.title: I need help hosting my rsps
channel.description: OK so i want to host with hamachi because port fowarding isnt my thing. Now i have downloaded hamachi and i have my friends in my hamachi group. How can i make it so they can play. I can play right now but they get error connecting to server. Help? * additional info* It is a teamtorva source

item.title: I need help hosting my rsps
item.dc:creator: @pkufast pkufast
item.description:
@pkufast wrote:

Okay, so first your going to get your hamachi ip, go into the client. Go into client.class (.java). Change the public server ip to your hamachi ip. Close save, compile. done.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help hosting my rsps
